text: I will continue discussions with marine conversation charities like @sascampaigns and organisations like the @TyneRiversTrust, as well as @NorthumbrianH2O and local representatives of the @EnvAgency to help clean up the Tyne, Derwent and Team rivers in our constituency.

I hope the government will rise to this challenge by properly funding the @EnvAgency, committing to ending sewage discharges into our rivers, and by not watering down environmental regulations when we so desperately need them.

@AdamBaylissEA @ChkeitaKing @EnvAgencyYNE @SheffCouncil @moorsforfuture @WildSheffield Thank you. I live in Doncaster now but originally from Sheffield.  Know how fast the small rivers/streams being fed from the moors can turn from a trickle to a torrent in their narrow valleys.

Lots of people passing @CodyDock really distressed at oil once more flowing down tidal river Lea. Been reported (again) to @EnvAgency. There is increased frequency with this - weekly & sometimes more. Birds nesting, reed bed filthy etc. Hard to get good pics! @LDNWaterkeeper https://t.co/2MJJqrU7vc
